metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1201 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Privoxy before 3.0.22 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(file descriptor consumption) via unspecified vectors.  NOTE: theprovenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solelyfrom third party information.

criterions.comment: privoxy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see notes').
